reviews.review: just no, no one likes this fucking game but everyone is addicted to it

Trash game with full tolerance for cheaters.
If you plan on spending time playing this game be aware you gonna play with cheaters all the time cause Devs aint gonna fix this game cause Faceit, Esea services is bringing them money.
i have acc with over 40games and i constantly get matched with guys who have almost new accounts.
Many guys got rekt and then suddenly lock onto heads like there is no tommorow.
Played Black ops 3 over 1000hours and met only 2 cheaters lol.
I aint gonna pay for Faceit only because this POS Devs cant fix their own game.
I love this game and I really want a knife lol
If you manage to pass by the hackers and you have strong nerves,then yes, it's a great game!
If you think cheating is an issue then don't play this game bc it's not.  As soon as they went ftp the community went less toxic and less cheats "change my mind"
mano, nesse jogo você pode ter uma ótima  felicidade de jogabilidade
